mapper.insert: INSERT INTO site_user(user_id, user_pwd, user_name, user_email, user_phone, user_addr, user_reg_date) VALUES(#{userId}, #{userPwd}, #{userName}, #{userEmail}, #{userPhone}, #{userAddr}, sysdate)
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(user_id) FROM site_user WHERE user_id = #{userId}
SELECT COUNT(user_email) FROM site_user WHERE user_email = #{userEmail}
SELECT user_id FROM site_user WHERE user_name = #{userName} AND user_phone = #{userPhone}
